channel.title: Data Science and Machine Learning Portfolio on Vishal K Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science and Machine Learning Portfolio on Vishal K Singh

item.title: Project-1: Drug marketing and Physician Targeting
item.description: With the increasing competition within pharmaceutical companies and tight regulations by the governments, it has become very difficult to market their drugs and target the physicians to prescribe their drugs once tested properly. So the role of Sales and marketing in pharmaceutical industry has become more critical in the recent times. In this article we will discuss how a machine learning model will help in analyzing the data, and predict the right physician to target, so as to market their drug.

item.title: Project-2: Diabetes Patient Re-Admission Prediction
item.description: Healthcare providers have benfited greatly from technological advancements. These days they have an extra challenge of finding the patients whom they need to treat multiple times, especially diabetic patients. The Goal behind this task, is to use this information for optimal resource allocation and better functioning. Link to Medium Article Link to Github Repository LinkedIn Profile

item.title: Project-3: Predicting the number of likes for youtube video
item.description: YouTuber is developed as a new type of career in recent decades. It also has become a source to earn money based on the popularity of the videos. The Goal here is to have a preliminary prediction of the videos likes, and understanding on their videosâ€™ performance, so that they may adjust their video to gain the more attention from the public, and eventually earn more money. Link to Medium Article

item.title: Project-4: Multi-Class Classification of Research Articles
item.description: Researchers have access to large online archives of scientific articles. As a consequence, finding relevant articles has become more and more difficult. Tagging or topic modelling provides a way to give clear token of identification to research articles which facilitates recommendation and search process in a much better way. Goal here is to predict the tags for each article based on the abstract words(NLP). Link to Medium Article Link to Github Repository
